entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Matane
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:16 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Flurries beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
